page.title: 16Girl Guides in S.on A.
page.content: Clubs. The Girl Guide movement was started by Lady Baden-Powell in 1910. It has been growing ever since and now has spread all over the world.This year,1985,is the 75th Aniversary.To mark the occasion each Guide and Brownie Pack has done 75 "Good Turns", for example "Make 75 new friends" or "Clean 75 windows".As another celebration a candle was lit by the Queen Mother and the flame passed around Britain to every Pack.At first the candle was given to the County Commissioners,they passed the flame to the District Commissioners who in turn gave it to the Guide Leaders.Our Leader went to Alcester to collect our Light.The 1st Shottery and Bishopton Guides celebrated by having a party.At the party we all had little candles which we lit from the big candle.The candle was blue with seven trefoils.
